explanation: [0-0] On a road outdoors, there is a green cylindrical object. On top of it sits a glass box with a layer of white pebbles at the bottom. A pair of hands is holding a black balloon filled with Coca-Cola. The person is wearing a blue down jacket. There is dry grass by the roadside.

[0-2] Then the person puts the Coca-Cola balloon into the right side of the glass box, followed by a green balloon filled with Sprite. Next, an orange balloon filled with Fanta is placed on the left side of the glass box, with the Sprite balloon in the middle.

[0-2] Then the person puts the Coca-Cola balloon into the right side of the glass box, followed by a green balloon filled with Sprite. Next, an orange balloon filled with Fanta is placed on the left side of the glass box, with the Sprite balloon in the middle.

[2-7] Then a left hand holding a small wooden stick reaches into the glass box from the left side, aiming at the Coca-Cola balloon and piercing it. The balloon bursts, spilling the Coca-Cola inside. Then, the orange Fanta balloon is also punctured, causing the liquid to spurt out from the small hole. Finally, the green Sprite balloon is punctured as well.

[7-15] Subsequently, the mixture of the three beverages rises slowly from the bottom of the glass box, eventually overflowing and spilling onto the ground. As more and more liquid overflows, white foam gradually forms, piling up and covering the entire glass box, creating a peculiar foam landscape.
